title: The Cupcake Server Guide~~ Cupcake服务器导航贴~~
author: Alvinjj
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Alvinjj 于 2011-4-22 19:26 编辑 

The Cupcake Server WorldCupcake的世界


(The city center)
（市中心）





This is a friendly guide for you to get started and know what to do in the server.本贴将会指导你如何在Cupcake服务起中顺利进行游戏。
You will find this guide very helpful, you will find answers of the server here.你的一切关于Cupcake服务器的问题都可以在本贴中找到答案。

General information of the server服务器的基本信息

IP address: 128.125.166.155
IP地址：128.125.166.155
Version: 1.4_01
版本： 1.4_01

Server Running Time: 24/7 (all days, all weeks)
服务器开放时间：24小时全天开放。

What is the Cupcake sever?
关于Cupcake服务器：

Why is the server called cupcake?
为什么服务器的名字叫Cupcake?

It is because Cupcake is cute and delicious! (quoted from Darkdukey)
因为Cupcake又可爱又美味！（Darkdukey说的-_-）

Ranking System in our server
Cupcake中的等级系统


God 神^|Admins 管理员^|                           Operators  技术员   (Exclusive - Porkman)^|Extreme Builders 专家建筑师^|Advanced Builders 高级建筑师^|Builders 建筑师^|Residents 居民^|Survivors 生存者^|Beginner 新手
^|Guests 游客点击此处进入地图等级制度的详细描述专贴



Map of the Cupcake WorldCupcake世界地图

Click here to go to the related post
点击此处进入地图专贴



(Created by Alvinjj, with the help of Lain)
